I'd give a hard pass for the $20 entrance fee that the game asks for. I know I'm not some "DbD VeTErEn" with copious hours to say how the game has changed over time, but there's problems that get in the way of making it a great asymetrical multiplayer game. I would only pick this up if you're able to play with friends when playing as a survivor, which is the only circumstance that I bought it. 

From the survivors' perspective, this game feels just bad for the majority of the time I've spent on it. Queuing solo is the worst way to play a survivor. There is no way to communicate with other survivors in-game with the exception of only two emotes to "follow me" and point (so if you play with a novice player, there's no kind of direction that you or others can give to them in order to help out the rest of the survivors). Although the experience of getting matched with constantly horrible teammates is from my perspective, it seems consistant with what others have said about this game. Killers and their annoyance can vary greatly, but the more experienced killer mains popped up than novice killers;   some of the dlc killers feel more cheap in their abilities, especially players that have commited to using them ie pay to win. The largest complaint towards killers are the fact that some player just love camping and there's really no good way of rescueing another player. Sometimes it just feels as if every killer I played against for a time had the most annoying perks on, which felt like a constant string of games where I'd be killed swiftly regardless if I was playing cautiously. 

Playing as killers on the other hand feels for the most part fine, as in no new player is going to dominate over survivors from the start. It does take time to get decent in order to be a good killer. Playing as killers feels like there's at least some learning curb, while survivors on the other hand feel really punished by actions of toxic survivors and killers. There are more than enough times to play as a lone survivor with no generators done because of either incompitent survivors, or (mainly) killers that have wiped out anyone that can get enough generators to get a hatch to appear on the map (in these senarios, which is easy for killers to patrol undone generators making the task of escaping nil to slim).

What really hurts this game is the part of the player base that I've played with, most of them being toxic. I do like how it's a horror movie themed game, plus it's a funner experience when playing with friends. You're playing Rainbow Six Siege toxic 2.0 electric horror boogaloo minus a voice and text chat. For the people that say "Oh YoU CAn PlAy SelFisH aAnD EsCapE" or "YoUr NOt SuPPoSe To WiN EvERy TiMe" or "YoU HaVeNt SPeNt EnOuGh TiMe WaTchIng YOuTubE StRAt VidEoS", there's plenty of multiplayer games that have a much better sense of balancing and learning regardless whether or not it's an "asymetrical" multiplayer game. In a compitent game, if I loose I can change how I play and eventually win at some point because I learned, which is an occurance I have never had with this game especially when considering the survivor gameplay. Bad killer = a really good chance you'll escape, good killer = quit the game there's no way to outsmart them because of the game's perk system and killer's abilities. Only buy this game during a sale and when you have three other friends ready to play DBD with you when playing a survivor. Or better yet, play gmod murder. Playing with friends is the only way that I've managed to get almost 50 hours out of the game.

LOBBY SIMULATOR

I have played this game for a long time now, almost 2 years, it had it's ups and downs but right now you can finally see the devs going in the right direction of balance. Sadly this upsets all the bad players in the game who refuse to learn a new meta in which they are not allowed to make mistake after mistake.
So to all other players: please ignore the negative review bombing.
And to the devs: keep it up, you're doing a pretty good job so far!

There's been a recent update that has left lots of people unhappy because it nerfs the (objectively stronger) side of the game.

However, I believe a review should be based off of more than just one update. To that end my experience with the game has been great, both as killer and survivor. This is the game that I keep coming back to and nearly always enjoy. The Devs are very active and have done a lot to bring the game forward in the last few months.

我只想说，是否应该给那些萌新人类给条生路。玩了15个小时，一直玩的都是人类，更新后第一次玩屠夫，随随便便耿直抓人就拿了个四杀。那些说人类太强的人，这个游戏的确应该有适当的恐怖感，再怎么说他也是一个恐怖游戏。
       但是我说的是屠夫是各方面非常强，无论是技能还是配件等方面，通通都碾压人类。人类躲猫猫修电机，什么？不存在的。屠夫轻易的就能找到你，既然躲在柜子里也会被发现那么还有什么地方可以躲呢？只能说这次制作组没想明白吧。
       最顶尖的和最底层的玩家，无一不很痛苦，人皇没有与屠夫抗衡的机会，屠夫没有抓人的快感。而萌新则是一边倒的状态，萌新人类完全没有游戏体验，屠夫想交易刷分分数不够，但那个人类会这么心甘情愿的让他交易？虽然萌新屠夫非常舒服，但那又是多少人，难道一定所有人都要玩屠夫才满意吗？
       多数人服从少数人，真的可笑。
       I just want to say whether we should give way to those new human beings. After playing for 15 hours, all of them were playing the human race. After the first update, they played with the butcher, and casually took the four kill. Those who say human beings are too strong must have a proper sense of terror.
       But I say that the butcher is very strong in all aspects, whether in skills or accessories, and so on. Hid cat and cat repair motor, what? It does not exist. The butcher can easily find you. If you hide in the cupboard, you will be found. Where else can you hide? It can only be said that the production team did not want to understand.
       The top and bottom players are all very miserable. The emperor has no chance to compete with the butcher. The butcher has no pleasure in catching people. But sprout is a one-sided state. The new man has no game experience. The butcher wants to deal with the brushing points enough, but will the human be so willing to let him trade? Although the new butcher is very comfortable, but how many people are there? Is everyone satisfied with the butcher?
       It is ridiculous that most people obey a small number of people.

Dead by Daylight is hands-down my favorite game on Steam and my most played game on Steam. First-off let me say that when you buy Dead by Daylight you essentially get two games for the price of one. You can play as a murderous killer or a cunning survivor. Each game mode has drastically different playstyles. Whether you're looking for a casual game with friends or the isolated horror experience with strangers that's advertised there's something here for everyone.
   Play as a survivor and use quick thinking and caution to escape the Entity's trials where random strangers take the roll of one of twelve murderous killers as they chase and hunt you until you're dead. Choose from atheles to average Joes as you learn the ropes of the trials. With procedurally generated character progression your progress will be one of a kind. After reaching the highest level, prestige for rewards and bragging rights as you continue to explore. Experience a game where you find new allies and enemies amongst the other survivors and the killer. With every character controlled by another player you will experience horror like never before.
   Play as a murderous killer driven to kill by the Entity. Explore the world from the eyes of a beast as you hunt and kill the survivors. Experience a new level of mind games as you anticipate survivor movements to catch more evasive prey. Control the action with the best connection as you host the trial on your turf and your terms. Use a variety of killers, abilities and add-ons to craft a unique horror experience.

Notes:
The game is constantly in development, view the development roadmap at Dead by Daylight.com . Killer is locked in first person whereas the survivors are locked in third person. There is an in-game store where cosmetics and killers can be purchased with playtime points. Some items are locked behind a pay wall only but those are in the minority. The community is full of good, bad, friendly, and toxic players.

so i just bought this game back in summer sale. for the first day i thought this game not gonna be that awesome, because of me keep die and can't survive properly. But then i played for more longer time, and now i understand, this game is totally about your play time. no matter what perks u had, if you spent less time in the game, you aren't gonna be as good as others. beside i love this game so much. very challenging, interesting, and yes so much fun in it,. it is worth to buy
ауе горм игруля

[h1] НАЧАЛО [/h1]

Всем привет. Меня зовут Дмитрий, и я хочу рассказать вам о такой игре как Dead by Daylight, хотя думаю вы и так это поняли. Обзор будет достаточно объемным и информативным(на мой взгляд), так что усаживайтесь поудобнее и, если хотите, читайте до конца, чтобы сделать для себя вывод: покупать эту игру, или же нет. Хочу также сказать, что у меня было множество аккаунтов с этой игрой и суммарно наиграно у меня в этой игре более 1500 часов.

[h1] ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ [/h1]

Геймплей(игровой процесс) в этой игре оригинален, и похожего вы мало где найдете. Здесь вам предстоит убегать от убийцы, заводить генераторы, изучать историю(по желанию), вешать на крюки выживших, прокачивать своих персонажей, и конечно же... платить за DLC, но это уже отдельная тема. Вообще, геймплей на любителя, не каждый любит кровь и мрачные картины, однако... Эта игра затянула многих, и я в их числе. Затягивает тут то, что локации постоянно разные, а все объекты на карте появляются случайно, и в игре достаточно много персонажей с их уникальными способностями. Кстати, о персонажах. В игре присуствуют убийцы и выжившие, на данный момент выживших, как и убийц, больше 5, и добавляются они каждый сезон(весна, лето, осень, зима). На этом все, дальше мне лень писать, напишу потом)))...

Dead by Daylight is a game that packs an interesting experience. Whether it comes in the form of sacrificing persistent survivors as the killer or evading killers in your never-ending goal of escaping as a survivor. DBD deals the player a hand full of unique gaming experiences. Sometimes, they leave us pulling our hair and cursing the world (secretly ourselves). But majority of the time, these experiences are fun, exhilarating and unexpected. It is these unexpected events that have made me a loyal fan for the past 2 years (ever since launch). It only gets better when you realize that the staff actually wants to make this game a better experience for all players (even if they don’t succeed all the time *cough* Freddy nerf *cough*) Truthfully, I’d recommend this game to others (especially those looking for a challenge). If you are unsure if you’d like it, my only advice is do NOT get this game on a free weekend. You will not get the full experience if you do. (Trust me)

This game, I have almost 1000 hours into I'm at around 940 now I believe. Though I'm a killer main I do frequently play survivor with my friends every weekend and has been this way for months. Now as most comments recently say this new update Is "killing the game" though a common misconception is that the killer would run the game. 

Survivors before pre-patch could determine millions of avenues with certain things that have changed. (You can check patch notes). A further issue that some survivor mains, or really players in the general populus is that the killer shouldn't be OP. You're going to be buying a game that is a 1 v 4. By the logic the killer should be 4x stronger than the survivors making the game exceptionally harder as people would die, where previously 1 death would not effect the team if you had a good runner. Now things and times are more limited and the intensity factor has too be increased.

If you're reading these comments to the idea of buying the game, don't give any attention to the down voted posts that have been spamming the location as with any update there will be salt and with something so drastic in change you're going to see some people leave and some people stay. The ones who have stayed are adapting to the current game, the ones who are leaving find the game either to far the killers direction or just dont like the patch.

What I can tell you though, is give the game a shot.the learning curve at the start will be steep, and will be difficult to climb over with some of the new changes. (this applies to both killer and survivor). It is still very much a great game people just don't like the new ways, and in no way are they bad it's just balancing and with balancing some people have their favorite perks have to be used differently. I still will highly suggest this game to anyone I meet.

Lets not forget how impossible it is to win against any of the killers you have to pay for. Can't see freddy at all and by the time you're put in the dream world theres nothing you can do. Mike myers you can't counter. by the time you notice him you're already dead, same thing with the pig. The cannibal one shotting you no matter what. Can't fight that shit. Game is only fun playing as the killer cause thats the only way to win

The Game is fun. There you go. Forget these crybabies complaining about balance patches nerfing their stuff and just come play. People are toxic in every community, it’s just this game has a vocal minority. It’s really fun to play Kill Your Friends if you can get 4-5 people together, and the multiplayer experience is fun. Don’t let the nonsense discourage you from enjoying a genuinely fun and enjoyable game. And for only 20 bucks, it’s worth giving a shot. The Devs work so hard on this game and 85% of these negative reviews are knee jerk reactions of frustrated toxic players who have stopped playing the game for fun and play it to torment and troll others, who have finally been stopped by the balancing the developers have done. That’s not to say the game is issueless, but as am afforadable, fun, and entertaining experience, I am glad to have purchased and enjoyed DBD.

Das Spiel ist seit dem Patch 2.0 sehr stark verbessert worden. Jetzt mit dem Patch 2.1 gibt es einen erneuten Aufschrei, da Survivor, die seit Anbeginn der Dead by Daylight Zeit ziemlich stark sind, wieder generft wurden. Man hat jetzt nicht mehr ganz so viele komm aus dem Gefängniss frei Karten mehr, da schwache Killer nun endlich stärker gemacht werden, wie es auch sein sollte. 

Dennoch gibt es auch noch auf beiden Seiten Perks die zu stark und daher ständig benutzt werden. Aber: Das Spiel arbeitet dran. Es wird immer besser und besser, wenn man sich da die Anfänge von DbD anguckt, ist es eine unglaubliche Verbesserung des Spieles. Man darf ebend nur nicht erwarten das man immer gewinnt, egal welche Seite man spielt.

Sadly, I can't recommend this game for one thing: The Community. This game has an incredibly biased community that thinks one side should suck more than the other. Playing survivor isn't fun and will never be without friends as teammates dont know how to hold a button or hear, and killer isn't fun with half the roster being weak and annoying things that are meant to be game mechanics. All you will get is disappointment from getting used to a playstyle for either side, and have it stripped instead of looking at both sides and fixing the glaring issues (Camping, Looping, Tunneling, Shit Teammates, DCs, Toxicity) among other things. This game will never be fixed until the community gets together to create a balanced game, instead of grouping up to attack the other side like apes.

だいぶ前にアンインストールした、動画勢の意見です。

ランク帯の人数比を出さないで、殺害率を出しても意味がないのではないかと考えています。
というのも、未熟なものでも上に行けてしまうと、必然的に格差マッチが発生してしまいます。
もちろん、人数比だけでバランス調整を行うのは「そもそも、査定がおかしい」という問題を抱えているため、信憑性ありません。
しかし、同じ熟練度同士を戦わせる場である、ランクマッチというシステムにおいて、そのシステムが意味をなしていないのならば、極端な話プライベートマッチで統計をとっているのと代わりないのではと考えています。

対戦相手側のナーフ等で初心者を救済するよりも、初心者には初心者と戦わせる方がよっぽど救済になるのではないのかと考えています。

The game is fun but has rough balance issues.  At newbie ranks, Killers are way too strong and far easier to play, stomping newbies almost every game.  At pro ranks, it's apparently the opposite. There's probably a sweet spot in the mid ranks somewhere, but the end result is that the devs keep buffing the Killers and nerfing the Survivors for top rank play, making the balance problem for newbies even more brutal.

Be aware that new players face a serious, challenging grind before they'll be able to play a Survivor well enough to not feel like the game is broken. If you can handle that barrier to entry, the game is pretty fun.

MMR and SBMM has completely ruined this fan favorite game.Imagine every game lasting 2-5 minutes and knowing there is nothing you can do to stop it. Imagine having to be face camped every game for the reason that that's the only way to secure a kill now. What they have brought is going to kill the game. Once a fun and enjoyable game will now be filled to the brim of toxicity and sweat. No one on either side is going to have a fun time with this.

生存者と殺人鬼に別れて対戦する非対称ホラーマルチアクションゲーム。
互いに能力有りの鬼ごっこ&隠れんぼ的なプレイ感です。
キラー側は一方的に攻撃・追い詰める気持ちよさが、
サバイバー側は連携プレイによって脅威を切り抜ける楽しさが味わえます。
勝敗が明確に決まっておらず、各プレイヤーが
「ホラーゲームっぽい動き」
を行うことで両サイドの利益が最大化されるような仕組みになっています。
このゲーム特有の「ホラー映画の登場人物になったような」プレイ感は一度味わう価値があります。
人の背中に凶悪に改造された禍々しいチェーンソーを押し付けるのは楽しいです。

●2019/5/16時点でのゲームバランスについて
現状は非常にカジュアルなゲームバランスです。
つまり、大きくサバイバー側に傾いています。
基本的なゲームの定石を把握したサバイバーが揃った場合、キラーに勝ち目はほぼありません。
キラーのウデマエより、サバイバーのプレイングにミスがあることを祈るほうが重要です。
これは技術の上達で解決できる問題ではなく、非対称ゲームの宿命として上位層のランクほど多人数側がミスなく有利に運べるため、やりこむほどむしろ勝つのは至難になってしまいます。

他に競合するタイトルがなく、そもそも競技性があるゲーム内容ではないので、タイトル固有のゲーム体験は色あせませんが、殺人鬼側はプレイすればするほど拭えない無力感に打ち砕かれることになります。
虽说任何游戏都有生命周期，但这次版本更新将大大加快这款游戏走向衰败，人屠体验都太特么差了！
我觉得下个版本更新人类进入游戏后直接挂树上。每个人欧三次看谁欧下来。这样屠夫还可以不用抓人就能四杀。
Hmmm. I think the killer need a little nerfing so that they arent killing all 4 every single game xD

내 인생을 망치러 온 나의 구원자
나의 메튜, 나의 데바데
整体蛮好玩的，是根据第五人格才了解到的该款游戏，整体画风质感非常优秀，比较有创意。体验不足的地方一个是玩家的能力匹配系统，希望能再优化下，新手遇到高级屠夫，屠夫遇到高级逃生者，或者是总是遇到萌新队友，拔线或者送人头都是很不好的体验，另外有个别地方有卡BUG——小土坡下坡的位置。
游戏平衡性太差，人类根本没法玩，屠夫把把四杀，有什么意思？？垃圾游戏，没办法玩，新人不建议买。真的很差！！！
一个逃生类游戏，最大的成就感不是来自于逃出生天，而是在于有没有皮到屠夫。2.10这次更新我觉得把这个游戏拉回到了设计者的初衷，这很棒！让那些动辄2000小时不玩的人走好了，因为这群人只在乎自己的感受，从未热爱过什么。如果真的喜欢这个游戏，就不要抱怨。没人逼着你玩你觉得弱势的人类，你可以秒变屠皇（如果你是真的高玩）。希望暑假过后，这个游戏的环境可以变得好一些。再一次支持游戏的策划和平衡调整。
改动太司马了，退坑~
120小时萌新更新前屠夫段位14，现在12，被人皇溜了半局都能留下两个不掉段，这次改动过后玩人不存在的，玩也是被虐

El juego actualmente tiene demasiados bugs que rompen la experiencia de juego y le dan una ventaja valiosa al jugador que abusa de ellos. Están convirtiendo el juego de PC en la versión de Móvil para atraer a más casuales mientras ignoran a la fanbase.

越改越垃圾，对逃生者极度不友好，新手绝壁体验差，今天发现我点个夹子也会受伤。。。而且弹射用完被屠夫追不会冷却，，，，无语了，照这样下去人会越来越少。希望官方能看懂中文。。。
sb

呵呵。麻烦你在瞎鸡儿改平衡的时候先把改档刷血点什么的问题解决了好吗。现在夹子双红你告诉我你怎么玩？我就在无敌点和各种窗户板子下面摆上夹子，就不说你点了就受伤吧，点完还没用，人家过一会自己就重新安装了，人类往哪跑？你告诉我躲猫猫，然后又出一堆屠夫透视技能。让你制作组亲手试玩一下人类这么难？技术不够顶配来凑的人到处都是，游戏内举报一点吊用都没有。游戏外举报有时候你也不管。微调外挂作弊你又不能阻止。
服务器到现在也没弄好，屠夫一卡人类直接不用玩。甚至还有低素质的屠夫拔插的。
以前削弱人类，那是人类真的强，速修屠夫根本就没办法（顶配除外）。这次一削弱直接把弹射守夜人等等五个技能废了，板子也是疯狂暗改一直在减少，现在走到哪里不是青青草原？你让我往哪里跑？上次前翻版改版让板子现在最多绕两圈就要吃极限刀，还不满意吗？
我不是说人类一定要溜屠夫五台电机，但是四个人里有人修电机就总是要有人溜屠夫的吧？你不能说一被看见就要死啊？以前有各种套路各种心理博弈，现在同水平的屠夫和人类我屠夫就当砍刀屠夫，带上擦刀丑脸踢板耿直追你还砍不死你吗？更别说还有各种配件了
这游戏最好玩的地方就在于溜屠夫时和屠夫的心理博弈和人类玩法的多样化，有疯狂修电机的机皇，喜欢惊喜连连摸箱子的欧皇，带着手电乱射的皮皇。好了现在心理博弈基本没有了，皮皇也都死光了，摸箱子的还敢天天逛大街？不修电机你出的去才怪。只剩血衣暴走族机皇黑妹还在默默地玩着qte小游戏了　　2018.7
